roleset.name: threaten

role.descr: Instrument or Manner if separate from Arg 0

example.name: all arguments
example.text: After a few drinks, Mary menaces society by getting behind the wheel.

roleset.note: Differences between this frame and that of 'threaten' may beattributed to the fact that 'menace' is a more canonical member of 31.1,whereas 'threaten' is more similar to verbs of speaking. Frame by Claire

predicate.note: Frames file for 'menace' based on internet usage examples, expansion viaVN. Verbnet entry 31.1, comparison with 'threaten.'
